sourcesContent:
Buttons with dropdowns

Use the.input-group and [aria-label=''] through buttons with dropdowns.

  • Ecommerce
  • Email
  • Users
  • Bookmarks
  • Starter kit
  • Gallery
  • Blog
  • Maps
  • Widgets
  • Project
  • Contacts
  • Tasks
  • To-Do
  • FAQ
  • Knowledgebase
  • Support Ticket
